Function Documentation

static int lustre_is_fsname_valid ( const char *  fsname,
const int  minlen,
const int  maxlen 
) [inline, static]

Check whether the fsname is valid.

Parameters:
fsname [in] the fsname to be checked
minlen [in] the minimum length of the fsname
maxlen [in] the maximum length of the fsname
Return values:
0 the fsname is valid
>0 the invalid character in the fsname
-1 the fsname is too short
-2 the fsname is too long
